about_the_game:
Welcome to Cozy Town, a delightful slice-of-life farming adventure where you can create your dream homestead, form meaningful connections, and enjoy the peaceful rhythms of small-town living. Whether you're an experienced farmer or a newcomer to the countryside, there's always something exciting waiting for you in this enchanting world.

Step into a quaint, picturesque village surrounded by lush forests, sparkling rivers, and fields of opportunity. Cozy Town is alive with vibrant characters, seasonal festivals, and endless possibilities for relaxation and discovery. Whether you're growing crops, fishing by the lake, or helping your neighbors, every moment is a chance to find joy in the little things.

What Will You Do in Cozy Town?

  • Farm to Your Heart’s Content
    Transform your plot of land into a flourishing farm! Plant and nurture a variety of crops, raise adorable animals, and harvest your way to success. Experiment with different farming techniques to maximize your yields, and make your farm uniquely yours.

  • Build Relationships with the Townsfolk
    Cozy Town is home to a cast of friendly and quirky characters, each with their own stories, dreams, and personalities. Befriend your neighbors through meaningful conversations, gift-giving, and helping them with tasks. Who knows? You might even find love!

  • Relax and Reconnect with Nature
    Take a break from your chores and enjoy the peaceful countryside. Fish at tranquil rivers, explore hidden corners of the forest, or simply bask in the beauty of changing seasons. Every environment is brimming with surprises and rewards for those who take the time to explore.

  • Create and Customize
    Build and upgrade your farm, house, and tools to suit your playstyle. Personalize your home with cozy decorations, furniture, and designs to create a space that feels truly yours. Let your creativity shine!

  • Celebrate the Seasons
    With each new season comes fresh opportunities and events. Participate in lively festivals, tackle seasonal challenges, and discover unique crops and fish that make every time of year feel special.

  • A World Full of Secrets
    Beyond the fields and town lies a world of mystery. Unearth hidden treasures, uncover secrets about the town’s past, and embark on adventures that will shape your story in Cozy Town.

Why You'll Love Cozy Town

Cozy Town isn’t just a game—it’s a warm, welcoming escape where you can slow down, savor the moment, and find happiness in the simple joys of life. With its soothing atmosphere, engaging gameplay, and lovable characters, Cozy Town offers an experience that’s as heartwarming as it is rewarding.

So grab your tools, pack your fishing rod, and get ready to start the life you’ve always dreamed of. Your cozy adventure begins now!

name: Cozy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Build your dream farm, make lifelong friends, and experience the joys of small-town living in Cozy Town. Plant crops, raise animals, fish, craft, and enjoy seasonal festivals. Escape the hustle and bustle—relax and live your best life in a charming countryside adventure.
